languages.text: {n}Священники Экклезиархии разделили сию ношу со скорбными, явившись в их поселки и проповедую им о праведности тяжкого труда. Некоторые пастыри даже предпочли остаться в лагерях насовсем, и вокруг них начали плодиться пустынные культы мучеников-аконитов, славящие Лорд-капитана за дарованное им право пострадать во славу Бога-Императора.{/n}

{n}Many of the Ecclesiarchy's priests sought to share in this burden with the poor souls, coming to their villages and preaching to them about the righteousness of hard work. Some priests have even chosen to stay in the camps permanently, where the desert cults of Aconyte martyrs have begun to gather around them, glorifying the Lord Captain for granting them the right to suffer for the glory of the God-Emperor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Священники Экклезиархии разделили сию ношу со скорбными, явившись в их поселки и проповедую им о праведности тяжкого труда. Некоторые пастыри даже предпочли остаться в лагерях насовсем, и вокруг них начали плодиться пустынные культы мучеников-аконитов, славящие Лорд-капитана за дарованное им право пострадать во славу Бога-Императора.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Ecclesiarchy's priests have shared this burden with the mourners, coming to their villages and preaching to them about the righteousness of hard work. Some pastors have even chosen to stay in the camps permanently, and the desert cults of Aconyte martyrs have began to gather around them, glorifying the Lord Captain for granting them the right to suffer for the glory of the God-Emperor.{/n}

{n}The Ecclesiarchy's priests have shared this burden with the mourners, coming to their villages and preaching to them about the righteousness of hard work. Some pastors have even chosen to stay in the camps permanently, and the desert cults of Aconyte martyrs have began to gather around them, glorifying the Lord Captain for granting them the right to suffer for the glory of the God-Emperor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}许多国教牧师想办法帮助这些可怜的人。他们来到当地人的村落中，宣讲勤劳工作的道义，有些牧师甚至选择永远定居在营地里。在那里，沙漠殉道者教会的信徒们逐渐聚集在牧师周围，赞美领主舰长赐予他们为神皇的荣耀受苦的权利。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Many of the Ecclesiarchy's priests sought to share in this burden with the poor souls, coming to their villages and preaching to them about the righteousness of hard work. Some pastors have even chosen to stay in the camps permanently, where the desert cults of Aconyte martyrs have begun to gather around them, glorifying the Lord Captain for granting them the right to suffer for the glory of the God-Emperor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}许多国教牧师想办法帮助这些可怜的人。他们来到当地人的村落中，宣讲勤劳工作的道义，有些牧师甚至选择永远定居在营地里。在那里，沙漠殉道者教会的信徒们逐渐聚集在牧师周围，赞美领主舰长赐予他们为神皇的荣耀受苦的权利。{/n}
{n}许多国教牧师想办法帮助这些可怜的人。他们来到当地人的村落中，宣讲勤劳工作的道义，有些牧师甚至选择永远定居在营地里。在那里，沙漠殉道者教会的信徒们逐渐聚集在牧师周围，赞美领主舰长赐予他们为神皇的荣耀受苦的权利。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Muchos de los sacerdotes de la Eclesiarquía quisieron compartir esta carga con las pobres almas, acudiendo a sus aldeas y predicándoles sobre la rectitud del trabajo duro. Algunos pastores incluso han optado por quedarse en los campamentos de forma permanente, donde los cultos del desierto de los mártires de Aconyte han empezado a reunirse en torno a ellos, alabando {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán por concederles el derecho a sufrir por la gloria del Dios Emperador.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Many of the Ecclesiarchy's priests sought to share in this burden with the poor souls, coming to their villages and preaching to them about the righteousness of hard work. Some pastors have even chosen to stay in the camps permanently, where the desert cults of Aconyte martyrs have begun to gather around them, glorifying the Lord Captain for granting them the right to suffer for the glory of the God-Emperor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Muchos de los sacerdotes de la Eclesiarquía quisieron compartir esta carga con las pobres almas, acudiendo a sus aldeas y predicándoles sobre la rectitud del trabajo duro. Algunos pastores incluso han optado por quedarse en los campamentos de forma permanente, donde los cultos del desierto de los mártires de Aconyte han empezado a reunirse en torno a ellos, alabando {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán por concederles el derecho a sufrir por la gloria del Dios Emperador.{/n}

languages.text: {n}帝国聖教会の司祭の多くは、貧しい者の魂とこの負担を分かち合おうと、村々を訪れ、勤勉に働くことの正しさを説いた。司祭の中には、野営地に永住することを選ぶ者さえおり、その周辺地域にはアコニットの殉教者たちの砂漠の魔女団が形成されようとしていた。それらの者は、神帝陛下の栄光のために苦難を受ける権利を与えてくれたロード・キャプテンを讃えている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Many of the Ecclesiarchy's priests sought to share in this burden with the poor souls, coming to their villages and preaching to them about the righteousness of hard work. Some pastors have even chosen to stay in the camps permanently, where the desert cults of Aconyte martyrs have begun to gather around them, glorifying the Lord Captain for granting them the right to suffer for the glory of the God-Emperor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帝国聖教会の司祭の多くは、貧しい者の魂とこの負担を分かち合おうと、村々を訪れ、勤勉に働くことの正しさを説いた。司祭の中には、野営地に永住することを選ぶ者さえおり、その周辺地域にはアコニットの殉教者たちの砂漠の魔女団が形成されようとしていた。それらの者は、神帝陛下の栄光のために苦難を受ける権利を与えてくれたロード・キャプテンを讃えている。{/n}
{n}帝国聖教会の司祭の多くは、貧しい者の魂とこの負担を分かち合おうと、村々を訪れ、勤勉に働くことの正しさを説いた。司祭の中には、野営地に永住することを選ぶ者さえおり、その周辺地域にはアコニットの殉教者たちの砂漠の魔女団が形成されようとしていた。それらの者は、神帝陛下の栄光のために苦難を受ける権利を与えてくれたロード・キャプテンを讃えている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nombre des prêtres de l'Ecclésiarchie ont cherché à alléger le fardeau de ces pauvres âmes, venant jusque dans leurs villages pour y prêcher les vertus du dur labeur. Certains prêtres ont même choisi de rester de façon permanente dans les camps où les cultes du désert des martyrs de l'Aconit commencent à se rassembler autour d'eux, glorifiant {mf|le seigneur|la seigneure}-capitaine de leur avoir octroyé le droit de souffrir à la gloire de l'Empereur-Dieu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Many of the Ecclesiarchy's priests sought to share in this burden with the poor souls, coming to their villages and preaching to them about the righteousness of hard work. Some priests have even chosen to stay in the camps permanently, where the desert cults of Aconyte martyrs have begun to gather around them, glorifying the Lord Captain for granting them the right to suffer for the glory of the God-Emperor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nombre des prêtres de l'Ecclésiarchie ont cherché à alléger le fardeau de ces pauvres âmes, venant jusque dans leurs villages pour y prêcher les vertus du dur labeur. Certains prêtres ont même choisi de rester de façon permanente dans les camps où les cultes du désert des martyrs de l'Aconit commencent à se rassembler autour d'eux, glorifiant {mf|le seigneur|la seigneure}-capitaine de leur avoir octroyé le droit de souffrir à la gloire de l'Empereur-Dieu.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Viele Priester der Ekklesiarchie wollten den armen Seelen einen Teil ihrer Last abnehmen. Sie kamen in die Dörfer und predigten von der Rechtschaffenheit harter Arbeit. Einige Pastoren haben sogar entschieden, dauerhaft in den Lagern zu bleiben, wo sich die Wüstenkults der aconytischen Märtyrer um sie herum versammeln und dem Lord Captain huldigen, weil er ihnen das Recht gewährt hat, für den Ruhm des Gottimperators zu leiden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Many of the Ecclesiarchy's priests sought to share in this burden with the poor souls, coming to their villages and preaching to them about the righteousness of hard work. Some pastors have even chosen to stay in the camps permanently, where the desert cults of Aconyte martyrs have begun to gather around them, glorifying the Lord Captain for granting them the right to suffer for the glory of the God-Emperor.{/n}

{n}Viele Priester der Ekklesiarchie wollten den armen Seelen einen Teil ihrer Last abnehmen. Sie kamen in die Dörfer und predigten von der Rechtschaffenheit harter Arbeit. Einige Pastoren haben sogar entschieden, dauerhaft in den Lagern zu bleiben, wo sich die Wüstenkults der aconytischen Märtyrer um sie herum versammeln und dem Lord Captain huldigen, weil er ihnen das Recht gewährt hat, für den Ruhm des Gottimperators zu leiden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ekleşiarşi'nin rahiplerinden pek çoğu, kasabalarına gelerek sıkı çalışmanın erdemliliğine dair vaazlar verdikleri bu zavallı insanlarla yüklerini paylaşmanın yollarını aradı. Hatta bazı rahipler, kamplara kalıcı olarak yerleşmeyi seçti. Bu kamplarda Akonit mazlumlarından oluşan çöl tarikatları, etraflarında toplanmaya başlayarak Tanrı İmparator'un şanı adına acı çekme haklarını kendilerine bahşettiği için Lord Kaptan'ı göklere çıkardı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Many of the Ecclesiarchy's priests sought to share in this burden with the poor souls, coming to their villages and preaching to them about the righteousness of hard work. Some priests have even chosen to stay in the camps permanently, where the desert cults of Aconyte martyrs have begun to gather around them, glorifying the Lord Captain for granting them the right to suffer for the glory of the God-Emperor.{/n}
